[00:00.00]Prisoner - Miley Cyrus (麦莉·赛勒斯)/Dua Lipa
[00:00.16]Lyrics by：Miley Cyrus/Dua Lipa/Andrew Wotman/Jordan K. Johnson/Marcus Lomax/Stefan Johnson/Ali Tamposi
[00:00.33]Composed by：Miley Cyrus/Dua Lipa/Andrew Wotman/Jordan K. Johnson/Marcus
[00:00.49]Prisoner prisoner
[00:02.62]Locked up can't get you off my mind
[00:05.11]Off my mind
[00:06.38]Lord knows I tried a million times
[00:09.06]Million times
[00:10.11]Oh whoa
[00:11.53]Why can't you why can't you
[00:14.00]Just let me go
[00:17.69]Strung out on a feeling
[00:19.82]My hands are tied
[00:21.71]Your face on my ceiling
[00:23.46]I fantasize
[00:24.61]Oh I can't control it I can't control it
[00:30.25]I can't control it
[00:32.78]I try to replace it
[00:34.90]With city lights
[00:36.86]I'll never escape it
[00:38.62]I need the high
[00:40.00]Oh I can't control it I can't control it
[00:45.83]You keep making it harder to stay
[00:50.36]But I still can't run away
[00:53.66]I gotta know why can't you
[00:55.91]Why can't you
[00:57.19]Just let me go
